TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lay-te_malkaka, title = Lay-te_malkaka, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lay-te_malkaka} }

S.FORM: Lay-te malkaka 萊特兄弟 kakiliman Lay-te malkaka "kamu nu inggu Wright brothers" nayi amilika a lecuh i in-dian-na-atu ey-hay-ey-cu, nu ayawan nu amilika pahikukuay,cacayay ku puna nuheni malkaka awwil.laytw nu ing a kamusa; Orville Wright,1871 a mihcaan 8 abulad 19 ademiad katukuh 1948 amihcaan 1 abulad 30 ademiad" atu wi-pul-lay-te "nu ing a kamu Wilbur Wright,1867 amihcaan 4 abulad 16 ademiad katukuh 1912 a mihcaan 5abulad 30 ademiad". (英語:Orville Wright,1871年8月19日—1948年1月30日)和威爾伯·萊特(英語:Wilbur Wright,1867年4月16日—1912年5月30日). nilaculan 1903 amihcaan 12 abulad 17 ademiad Lay-te malkaka paculil kuheni tu nikingkiwan nuhine a hikuki sakacacay ku banggu malaheci inemekan sayaway kubaeket nu balia sapaculil tu hikuki matulun kapah a saungayay kyu mabahel, ayda sa matineng tu naming ku katuuday tu nipikingkiw nuheni tu hikuki. Lay-te malkakacaay kaw heni ku sayaway mikingkiw tu sapacumud tu sabahel nu hikuki a tademaw, nika u heni kusayaway a mitanam tu sapabahel tu satedep atu sapisa ungaay nu canan nu hukuki, nanutawya sa mapatucek nu misangaay tu hikuki maneknek tu, wini analimaan a gigice neknek satu i hikuli. yum atabal henay ci Lay-te malkaka y anisibayan nuheni tu miinsacuay a kikay, batikal, kadideng atu duma u kikayay masasuala, wini a gigicu nu nalimaan nuheni u paneknekay tu patetekay, macalilaw ku sapabahel nu neni tu hikuki makakic tu kunidatenga nu heni. u heni ani sangaan tu adidi'ay a cacumudan nu bali nitanaman nuheni, yadah tu kunisuped masatungus tuway ku sulit, nisikian nuheni idaw ku talakaway a sakubad nu hikuki atu pulupila. Lay-te malkaka atu makakadum misiki tu sayaway a hikuki nu inzing. Namakayni i 1900 amihcaan malingatu katukuh i 1903 amihcaan nuheni sayawaw apabahel tu musaungayay nu ayawan sa, malwkaka naw saselic sananah a micumud misatabaki a mitanam atu miecaw, mala u sakapahay a paculilay tu hikuki kuheni, u hen isa kapah kuni pahabay nuheni tu nikasasupaini tu baluau' u kapahay a paculilay tu pabahelay tu hikuki a tademaw. Lay-te malekaka pakayni i tademaw idaw ku nipakihu, sisa imahini mulangatu tu sapikingkiw kanahatu idaw ku alialiyac idaw aca ku matudungay a nisangan tu pacakatu tu kakawaw. Lay-te malekaka wama nuheni sa u ciwlu nu midindusiay, sisa hinatahekal midang. 1878 a mihcaan adidi' henay kuwawa pataluma tu baluhay sakahemekan a canan. 1878 amihcaan, namiliwku taluma pataluma tu kahemekan a cacanan; mahidaay u bahel sananay a hikuki a sasalamaan. ina sasalamaan namakayni nu huwaku nu sayaway ni al-hung-se.ban-naw anikingkiwan nisikian kyu masanga, hatida cacay a adepah ku tanayu',u tatipeluk, u culay atu dawmiay a kilang nisangaan, odaw kiyani pakabit tu cowling sapasaungay malapulipila. Lay-te malekaka tanunamuh sa makaadih tu mahiniay a baluhay kahemeka a sasalamaan,mapeci nuheni sa misangaaca kuhini hida nu sayaway. . Lay-te malekaka nadikuda dateng sa kuheni nanutawya mapacekil kuheni tu sakay bahel tu hikuki .

Lay-te malkaka 萊特兄弟 kakiliman Lay-te malkaka "kamo no inggo Wright brothers" nayi amilika a lecoh i in-dian-na-ato ey-hay-ey-co, no ayawan no amilika pahikokoay,cacayay ko pona noheni malkaka awwil.laytw no ing a kamosa; Orville Wright,1871 a mihcaan 8 abolad 19 ademiad katokoh 1948 amihcaan 1 abolad 30 ademiad" ato wi-pol-lay-te "no ing a kamo Wilbor Wright,1867 amihcaan 4 abolad 16 ademiad katokoh 1912 a mihcaan 5abolad 30 ademiad". (英語:Orville Wright,1871年8月19日—1948年1月30日)和威爾伯·萊特(英語:Wilbor Wright,1867年4月16日—1912年5月30日). nilacolan 1903 amihcaan 12 abolad 17 ademiad Lay-te malkaka pacolil koheni to nikingkiwan nohine a hikoki sakacacay ko banggo malaheci inemekan sayaway kobaeket no balia sapacolil to hikoki matolon kapah a saongayay kyo mabahel, ayda sa matineng to naming ko katooday to nipikingkiw noheni to hikoki. Lay-te malkakacaay kaw heni ko sayaway mikingkiw to sapacomod to sabahel no hikoki a tademaw, nika o heni kosayaway a mitanam to sapabahel to satedep ato sapisa ongaay no canan no hokoki, nanotawya sa mapatocek no misangaay to hikoki maneknek to, wini analimaan a gigice neknek sato i hikoli. yom atabal henay ci Lay-te malkaka y anisibayan noheni to miinsacoay a kikay, batikal, kadideng ato doma o kikayay masasoala, wini a gigico no nalimaan noheni o paneknekay to patetekay, macalilaw ko sapabahel no neni to hikoki makakic to konidatenga no heni. o heni ani sangaan to adidi'ay a cacomodan no bali nitanaman noheni, yadah to konisoped masatongos toway ko solit, nisikian noheni idaw ko talakaway a sakobad no hikoki ato polopila. Lay-te malkaka ato makakadom misiki to sayaway a hikoki no inzing. Namakayni i 1900 amihcaan malingato katokoh i 1903 amihcaan noheni sayawaw apabahel to mosaongayay no ayawan sa, malwkaka naw saselic sananah a micomod misatabaki a mitanam ato miecaw, mala o sakapahay a pacolilay to hikoki koheni, o hen isa kapah koni pahabay noheni to nikasasopaini to baloao' o kapahay a pacolilay to pabahelay to hikoki a tademaw. Lay-te malekaka pakayni i tademaw idaw ko nipakiho, sisa imahini molangato to sapikingkiw kanahato idaw ko alialiyac idaw aca ko matodongay a nisangan to pacakato to kakawaw. Lay-te malekaka wama noheni sa o ciwlo no midindosiay, sisa hinatahekal midang. 1878 a mihcaan adidi' henay kowawa pataloma to balohay sakahemekan a canan. 1878 amihcaan, namiliwko taloma pataloma to kahemekan a cacanan; mahidaay o bahel sananay a hikoki a sasalamaan. ina sasalamaan namakayni no howako no sayaway ni al-hong-se.ban-naw anikingkiwan nisikian kyo masanga, hatida cacay a adepah ko tanayo',o tatipelok, o colay ato dawmiay a kilang nisangaan, odaw kiyani pakabit to cowling sapasaongay malapolipila. Lay-te malekaka tanonamoh sa makaadih to mahiniay a balohay kahemeka a sasalamaan,mapeci noheni sa misangaaca kohini hida no sayaway. . Lay-te malekaka nadikoda dateng sa koheni nanotawya mapacekil koheni to sakay bahel to hikoki .
